channel.title: Question please answer
channel.description:
Okay, is there any chance that i could set up 317 hiscores on 000webhost?
If so please comment - Thanks

item.title: Question please answer
item.dc:creator: @king-of-pvp king-of-pvp

item.title: Question please answer
item.dc:creator: @king-of-pvp king-of-pvp
item.description:
@king-of-pvp wrote:

Okay i have done it all and it’s all set up but when i log out of my server its laggs and when i look on my running source thing it says it cannot connect to my database, any help? thanks
